website_summaries.verdict: A portable and efficient way to roast or bake foods, but you'll have difficulty cooking water-based foods like rice or soups.
pros: Stays cool to the touch when cooking
Comes with a clamshell case, a user manual/cook booklet, and a cleaning tool
Can hit temperatures of 550 degrees F. Designed to keep food hot and ready to eat for hours after cooking
cons: No easy way to cook using liquids

customer_reviews.title: Did not work as promised.
customer_reviews.text: I had to send this back for a refund. It must have been defective because the red rubber gasket at the end would not stay against to glass tube to trap in the heat, so the food could not cook. This was after having to tighten the bolts/nuts underneath to keep the adjustable reflectors from flopping over. I contacted the company by e-mail about the gasket problem, but only received a standard computer-generated reply that did not address the problem. So disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Wright

customer_reviews.title: The best solar oven I've ever used!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome piece of equipment to own for camping on no-burn days. My thermometer was pegged at 300 degrees while I cooked a meat & potato dinner during the winter, which took about 60-75 minutes on a nice clear day. It holds enough food for one person, or 1.5 in a pinch. Clean up is easy, I just line the cooking tray with aluminum foil, which I discard after use, then I rinse the tray with water after it cools. The design of this oven is awesome! The clamshell mirrors make setup easy and foolproof. The materials and construction are top notch and make this something you will be proud to own and to show your friends.
customer_reviews.author: Mav

customer_reviews.title: If you are looking, you aren't cooking!!
customer_reviews.text: I very skeptical and ready to return it if it did not meet my expectations. It is a very well engineered and thought out product. It cooks relatively quickly if you don't keep opening it up to look at your food. I am also a dutch oven cooker and it shares the some same techniques such as: "If you are lookin, you are not cookin."
customer_reviews.author: Douglas & Denise Overman

customer_reviews.title: This really works and it tastes better than conventional cooking!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about this product at first. I did a trial run with hot dogs. I came outside after 12 minutes expecting the hot dogs to be barely cooked. Instead, I came outside to find the solar cooker steaming! The hot dogs were the best tasting Ive ever had! Far superior to the microwave or grill! This thing is for real! I can wait to start cooking more complex recipes with a solar cooking recipe book I just bought on Amazon. Why isnt everyone in the world using this???
customer_reviews.author: Erik Chait

customer_reviews.title: Love my GoSun Sport
customer_reviews.text: I love this stove! I don't say that about many things but I use the GoSun solar stove almost every day. I am happy when. The sun shines and I can roast some veggies, cook quinoa, or dry kale.
customer_reviews.author: jungleman

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I've used it at home and camping, and it is everything it claims to be. I've made steak and onions, pasta, chicken, pizza bites and hotdogs. It is portable and easy to clean. It gets hot!
customer_reviews.author: E Preston

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: You can hear the food sizzling in the oven, when it's cooking. Like any oven, you can cook food faster if you preheat it. I wish they made it easier to know if the oven was pointing at the sun, for most efficiency. There is a little bubble at one end of the oven glass tube. I'm not sure what it's for, but I've been using to try to direct the oven at the sun, in optimal position. The oven came with very meager instruction, and there is no reference to the bubble. It came with a really nice carrying bag, having several pockets for carrying utensils or other things. It cooks enough food for about two people.
customer_reviews.author: Rex S. Von Nothdurft

customer_reviews.title: Fun and tasty !!
customer_reviews.text: I have had my GoSun for two weeks and we are having so much fun with it ! We have cooked bread, meat, veggies and hot dogs.Also, a mix of cubed meat, potatoes and veggies. It takes at least twice as long as they said to cook anything (and in GA it has been HOT). But every thing is tasty and easy. Next try - scrambled eggs and a long skinny casserole !!
customer_reviews.author: Dale Salley

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised. We found that inserting a sheet ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. We found that inserting a sheet of wax paper under the food makes it much easier to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Caddis

customer_reviews.title: Useful solar grill
customer_reviews.text: We used this every day while we were in the Caribbean boating. Great for roadting vegetables and cooking meat. It is a little hard to clean. Works much faster in the absence of cloud cover.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Cool if you like to glamp
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cool device however it is not practical when cleaning it out! The scrub brush they provide is too harsh for the glass I think because it starts to scrap off the red coating on the glass! Anyway I still find it use full when cooking during glamping!!
customer_reviews.author: Tasha Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Tube Is Very Sensitive
customer_reviews.text: Vacuum tube broke after first use while cleaning. Not due to hot/cold temp change but from bristle suction from the cleaner. Be very careful when cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Lone Wolf

customer_reviews.title: GOSUN sun cooker
customer_reviews.text: Cooks very well. at sunny day, it took 50-min to cook frozen stir-fry vegetables with frozen sausages. it took 35-min to cook fish with vegetables at ambient temperature. The best is that the smell of fish stays outside the house.
customer_reviews.author: Bill-DelAltoMonte

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I have cooked eggs, chocolate chip cookies and chicken with vegetables. All were delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Dakota

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have Solar Cooler!
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly easy solar cooler to use! This solar oven heats up like a charm and cooks food perfectly! This can be used on the go, hiking, on a boat, pretty much anywhere. Even on an apartment balcony (which is where mine is used). Easy to use, easy to clean! Amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Sirmans

customer_reviews.title: Fast
customer_reviews.text: Camping and on the terrace here in az Works very well and fast Negative is cooking in those tubes, limits value a bit
customer_reviews.author: Melvin Shaffer

customer_reviews.title: Really cool product, and it works!
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my grandparents, they love it! They’ve baked everything under the sun in it (pun intended) including chicken, potatoes, brownies and cookies!
customer_reviews.author: MC_Mayn

customer_reviews.title: Great Solar Oven
customer_reviews.text: It needs a better swivel base design. Mind came apart loosing the screw in spring which I could not find, having to go to Home Depot to replace them.
customer_reviews.author: BEFloyd

customer_reviews.title: Using the sun - alone
customer_reviews.text: I think somewhere else I have already said that I love this. Tonight I did cube steaks and earlier I roasted cashews. I am waiting till February for the Fusion. I want both. They will be the right size for the 2 of us.
customer_reviews.author: VISA

customer_reviews.title: Incredible
customer_reviews.text: the efficiency is mind-blowing. product never fails to cook, even through clouds and cold, love it.
customer_reviews.author: Sunlight Works

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Food cooks fast & is very delicious! It cooked everything in less than an hour.
customer_reviews.author: cinnamonbear48

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS PRODUCT. WE ARE PREPPERS AND THIS IS PERFECT
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: we have used it several times works great. love it !!!
customer_reviews.author: bobby fowler

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great buy! Fun and easy to use. A forward thinking and ethical company.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Money saver
customer_reviews.text: We are on the grid but this little stove has saved us hundred of dollars. Set it up, add the food and let it do its thing while you do the chores. Every home should have one. Well made and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Marc B.

customer_reviews.title: GoSun Stove is clearly the best Solar Cooker on the market
customer_reviews.text: GoSun Stove is amazing! It heats up fast even when its cold outside. I have tested many other solar ovens, this oven is truly amazing. Not only does it heat up the fastest, it keeps the food warm even when its cloudy, or the sun goes down. Nothing is more satisfying than to see the steam come out of the oven! I think everyone should think about using it instead of a bar b que--- No smoke, no fuel and more versatile. The folks at gosun truly have a breakthrough in solar cooking.
customer_reviews.author: The Way it Is

customer_reviews.title: This needs to be at least 12" in diameter to be as useful as possible
customer_reviews.text: It needs to be larger; the diameter is too small to put any food in, unless you cut it into tiny pieces in aluminum foil. This needs to be at least 12" in diameter to be as useful as possible. My husband used it today to cook salmon. He liked it, however it just looked ok to me. A much larger size would be much better. Works as is, but is TOO small and takes a long time to cook. I am speaking for myself, not for him. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Paula K.

customer_reviews.title: Not an authorized re-seller for gosun
customer_reviews.text: I love the product! But Make sure the dealer is an authorized gosun dealer! There are some unauthorized re-selllers from the gray market that will sell you a product such as this re-seller, and the product will not be warranted!
customer_reviews.author: Solar Dude

customer_reviews.title: Things you should know.
customer_reviews.text: Received product broken and used. And when I say used I mean it had grease on it. Would never buy from this company gosun again
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Lobo

customer_reviews.title: I love my GoSun Sport
customer_reviews.text: I love my GoSun Sport. I have both the Pro-Pack and the GoSun Sport (2 separate cookers). I cook with it all the time and truly enjoy learning all of the capabilities. Over time so far it has been a hit when people walk into my house and I have them pulled out. People think they look like pieces of art! I have been able to cook tons of stuff in these, from hard boiled (not-boiled though) eggs, breads, kabobs, corn on the cobb, cookies, bratwurst, etc. This product has got my wife and I trying to figure out all the different ways we can use it. This is an amazing product!
customer_reviews.author: buhrmanjl

customer_reviews.title: Even works in Alaska
customer_reviews.text: Got mine 4 years ago. It's traveled with me to Alaska, the Keys, Maritime Provinces and always works. Many delicious and nutritious meals including spaghetti dinners, franks and beans, rice, and olive herbed potatoes. It's easy to use and to clean up. Got the GoSun Go recently and am using it for soups and hot water for coffee and tea. Had a tube break a couple of years ago and GoSun replaced it without question. Great product and company.
customer_reviews.author: David Hardy

customer_reviews.title: I use it almost every day!
customer_reviews.text: I'm in South Florida-so I don't like heating up my kitchen by cooking but I also love some things that take time, like sweet potatoes, green papaya, carrots, dry beans- you get the idea. Most days I put something out mid morning for lunch then another dish after lunch. It even works on a cloudy day, just not as fast. Love this thing!
customer_reviews.author: cynthia schaefer

customer_reviews.title: Portable and delivers hot meal. Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I've seen this grill achieve the feat of cooking great sausages, meat and eggs. My friend purchased it for our camping and it proved helpful since we needed something handy and portable. It's easy to clean best if the food is placed in a foil before cooking as it can be discarded after use. It's been interesting eating hot food out of this thing as it made camping easy without the stress of burning fire for food. Yes, it says what it does.
customer_reviews.author: Azzy

customer_reviews.title: The outdoor experience
customer_reviews.text: This product was very impressive from every aspect. From the out of box experience (with no assembly) to the satisfaction of cooking, this product has shown to be one of a kind. I have now been cooking with my GoSun products for over 5 months and have been experimenting with many different recipes. With that, I have successfully made everything from chicken wings, burgers, pad Thai and even beef jerky. The GoSun line provides a limitless feel of cooking with out the hassle of constant attention. Overall, it creates an amazing opportunity for me to enjoy the real reason I am outside with the perks of a warm meal.
customer_reviews.author: The Outdoor Guru

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: I was out camping with a friend who had this and I’m not sure why it never really cooked to any significant temperature, we used sausage and we gave up after about 30 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Van Damme

customer_reviews.title: It is sturdy, portable
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was fast and very well packaged. Within and hour of opening I was cooking and eating cheddar biscuits. Same cooking time as called for in the recipe. The cheese was gooey with just enough crisp. We have cooked quesadillas, sausages, shrimp kabobs, chicken, grilled onions and garlic all in an Arizona winter. It is sturdy, portable, light, very easy to use and the kids love it. Cannot wait to take it camping and to the beach etc! I can come home from work a couple hours before sunset, put in some chow and after enjoying a sunset refeshment dinner is hot and ready......saweeeet
customer_reviews.author: Greg Saxe, Freedom Trail Supply LLC

customer_reviews.title: Innovation at it's best!
customer_reviews.text: A green cooking solutions when outdoors, you can count on it on overcast days too! The company even plants 20 trees for each product sold through the nonprofit Trees for the Future.
customer_reviews.author: John Leary

customer_reviews.title: I love my GoSun
customer_reviews.text: I love my GoSun! So much that I ordered the GoSun oven too! I am a returned Peace Corps volunteer and very interested in alternative methods of cooking and baking. Actually, I am going to Africa on another PCV tour in the fall and planning to take them both with me. They were easy to set up and easy to use. They both cook well. The GoSun mini (which is what I have) cooks just enough for one. I have made muffins in it as well as shishkabobs. Try it - you will like it - and you just might save the planet!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great camping or backyard stove.
customer_reviews.text: Impressive design and it works great! I have cooked potatoes and squash on 10 degree winter days (if sunny) in 25-35 mins. GoSun Sport fits about 3 cups worth of chopped veggies. It impressed the other campers! Would be helpful to add a latch to hold the tray in while moving it about (or say filling the stove in the kitchen and then negotiating the back door while putting on boots and trying not to drop all your potatoes in the mudroom....just a fer instance), a piece of duct tape will likely work fine too. I think we'll be using this a lot in the spring/summer to warm up/cook lunch while we are working in the garden.
customer_reviews.author: Garth Shaneyfelt

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love using my GoSun. We live in Tampa Florida and take regular trips to the beach. It's an amazingly efficient and eco friendly way to grill on the beach. We currently live in an apartment. Where I can't find good lighting to use the grill regularly. When we move into a house I plan to use it more often!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Froehle

customer_reviews.title: Sustainable cooking.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. I bought the mini version and it cooked my food perfectly in the middle of the time. The wind knocked it off of where it was placed and the whole glass tube shattered. Sadly. I enjoyed using it to cook. Anywhere, anytime as long as you have access to sun.
customer_reviews.author: john tall

customer_reviews.title: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: I used this to cook food on a desert camping trip and it worked great. I cooked potatoes as part of brunch for two, as well as vegetables for dinner. It does take a bit longer to cook by the sun than than over a flame, but it seems to be a lot faster than other solar cookers. The potatoes took about 2 hours. It's also great to have in case of an emergency or situations where you don't have electric power.
customer_reviews.author: David R.

customer_reviews.title: Needs improvement.
customer_reviews.text: It uses sun power to that's great. It's also compact and easy to tote. However, the only space you have for cooking is in that narrow glass tube so you can't make several dishes simultaneously nor can you feed more then 2 people at a time. Plus you cannot use liquids of any kind of the tube bursts--so no cooking soups or making a dish that needs oil first, no boiling anything.
customer_reviews.author: Nocturnal

customer_reviews.title: A Fiesty Little Cooker Powered by the Sun
customer_reviews.text: The GoSun is an awesome way to explore and use natural (And Free) power to cook pretty much anything! It's great for fresh vegetables because it holds in the moisture and keeps them nice and steamed!! I've used the GoSun on hikes, picnics, and even on the beach and it has definitely proven to be worth it's value!
customer_reviews.author: Ronaldo Gillespie

customer_reviews.title: Effective and Well Made
customer_reviews.text: Excellent solar cooker - Made in the USA!. Showcases the robust manufacturing standards that Ohio products are know for.
customer_reviews.author: Pinot

customer_reviews.title: Innovative!
customer_reviews.text: Also have a sun oven, and the gosun is more adaptable overall (more forgiving in limited sun. Have used successfully in full sun, 5 degrees farenheit. Downside is adapting recipes for limited cooking space. Still working on that. But, well built and great design!
customer_reviews.author: Keith Lohmann

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful and innovative product
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful and innovative product. Set it so that it gets appropriate sun and you're off and running. Sturdy design but be careful with the glass food container - you could break this and it is a bit long. We use it for cut pork/beef/chicken with all kinds of cut up veggies and a touch of olive oil for a wonderful dinner quite a bit. Thanks GoSun and good luck in your sales!
customer_reviews.author: kd0845

customer_reviews.title: You'll fall in love with this solar cooker
customer_reviews.text: You'll fall in love with this solar cooker. It is easy to use for all kinds of foods. Cooking time depends on the strength of the sun but is generally very fast on clear days but works well in cloudy weather (just a bit more time). Clean up is easy as well and it stores as a compact folded unit. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Blastocyst

customer_reviews.title: This is not a good option for a backpacker- too big
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in part because I am a math teacher. The compound parabolic reflectors are a boon for an observation-driven math course. I have done a lot of research and invention related to biomass stoves to enable ultralight camping free of the need to carry liquid fuels. This is not a good option for a backpacker- too big, even with the fact it doesn't need fuel. Ideal for car camping, base camp, and home use.
customer_reviews.author: Nigel Wilson

customer_reviews.title: enjoyed loading my GoSun with brats
customer_reviews.text: In the warm Florida sun, enjoyed loading my GoSun with brats, hot dogs, sweet and sour chicken, General Tso's chicken nuggets, etc. while relaxing by the bay and watching boats, birds, dolphins and people. "Wow," I heard from people as they viewed the sizzling hot food in the Go Sun tray after only about 15 minutes in the Florida sun. "It's that hot, and you can still touch the tube." they said. It's tasty, it's surprisingly quick, it's light, it's maneuverable. Boaters commented that it would be a great thing to have when out on the water.
customer_reviews.author: patricia b. sherwin

customer_reviews.title: Great product. I'd get another one.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. Easy and fun to use. Cooked chicken and pork in it so far. Was possibly the best chicken I've ever put in my mouth. Cooks fast and evenly in my experience. Requires a bit of tending if you're using it when the sun is at low angles, shifting a lot. Cleaning is easy as is storing the unit. Check out a GoSun and see for yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Maroney

customer_reviews.title: A Very Unique Stove
customer_reviews.text: I bought my GoSun Sport Edition for my "Just in Case" preparation. It gives me piece of mind that my family will be able to have hot nourishing food in case of hurricanes or other disaster. This unique stove is well-designed, not difficult to use, work great, is not heavy, and occupies very little storage space. Every home should have one of these affordable backup stoves. I'm sure you will enjoy yours as much as I enjoy mine.
customer_reviews.author: Amy H.

customer_reviews.title: Fun, Fast, and Flavorful
customer_reviews.text: Excellent cooking device! A pleasure to use, nicely finished, stylish to carry with you and highly useful. I have used this stove for about a month and love how easy it is to set up and cook with, and how the foods cooked in it seem to retain more flavor. I have cooked and reheated pizza, meats vegetable stir frys; both in full sun and and somewhat overcast conditions in the northern ohio latitudes winter. I am anxiously awaiting the beverage insert to be able to heat fluids safely; this will extend greatly it's usefulness. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: The GoSun Stove is FABULOUS! I thought the 20 minute cook time claim was an exaggeration but it really did cook chilled raw beef in 20 minutes! I got this for use in my science classroom and now am seeing a mountain of possible uses for this product. I strongly recommend paying the extra $ to get the Pro-pack, not just the Sport edition stove. Especially if you are cooking for a family or want to have more than one dish for your meal (such as an entree and a dessert). It is so worth every penny. (And the GoSun customer service people go waaayy beyond to help you out!)
customer_reviews.author: Cap - Miffy

customer_reviews.title: I love this solar oven
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews, but this thing works better that I ever imagined. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I got the Gosun to replace my BBQ. I dont want to carry big propane tanks. I am impressed by the quality of the vacuum tube. It is easy to use. Th instructions are well written. They dont have recipes but any of my favorite, I will be able to adapt to cook in it. I will use it quite a lot this spring when I get sun in my backyard. In winter I would have to use it in the driveway and I dont want anything to happen to it. Cant wait to do some garlic bread into it and meatballs!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Poulin

customer_reviews.title: nice compact way to cook eco friendly
customer_reviews.text: awesome product. perfect efficiency around sun ray capturing. heats up fast, and cooks quick too. loving cooking hot dogs and bratwurst in this thing. really fun cookie without any resources being used up.
customer_reviews.author: J. Valeski

customer_reviews.title: Limited use due to solar power .. 10-2
customer_reviews.text: Cooks between 10 am and 2 pm. Not anytime or anywhere. Rain, clouds, any time other than direct sun between 10-2 and it does little or nothing.
customer_reviews.author: C. Finley

customer_reviews.title: Love this solar oven!
customer_reviews.text: This is an innovative product. I've cooked with several different solar ovens and this is by far the most portable, efficient, and fast ovens I've ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Kath

customer_reviews.title: Fun Little Solar Stove
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic little stove. I gave it to my dad for Christmas and he loves it. He does lots of camping in Arizona and finds it quite useful to cook an easy lunch or dinner.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Perreault

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, even cooks on cloudy days
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, even cooks on cloudy days. This little cooker has been really fun for our family. The best part, no gas. GO SUN!
customer_reviews.author: mt massive builders

customer_reviews.title: A major game changer!
customer_reviews.text: OMG I cannot share enough positive thoughts on this innovative use of our unlimited solar energy and beyond effective baking, grilling, and heating features of this unit! Before now, solar cookers where flimsy, clunky boxes difficult to move around and not intended for the "on the go" chef! Honestly there is not anything I would not try to cook in this grill! We featured this grill as part of our sustainable culinary services at TEDx with resounding awe, intrigue, and fabulous food! Well constructed and truly a game changer this is the go to next evolution in Eco cooking!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Doss

customer_reviews.title: camping stove
customer_reviews.text: I've not used mine yet as I plan to use it as our main camping stove. We just bought a popup camper and while it has a gas stove, I plan to use my GoSun stove more because it looks very easy to use so while we're relaxing, our dinner can be cooking! The tray slides out easily and I've put my whole, homegrown potatoes in it with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Already it has been on camping trips and family parties with us and everyone loved the design
customer_reviews.text: We've been using our GoSun Stove as often as the sun will allow and loving every minute of it. Already it has been on camping trips and family parties with us and everyone loved the design. Can't wait to continue to try new recipes and experiment with the wide range of capabilities. Thanks GoSun team for helping us to simplify our energy consumption one meal at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Thomas

customer_reviews.title: A fantastic idea and invention
customer_reviews.text: A fantastic idea and invention. I'm still learning how to harness its power - you certainly have to rethink the way you prepare and cook food to use it - but it's great for picnics and camping.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great product. I work outside a lot for my ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I work outside a lot for my job so its great to warm up my food any time of the year as long as there is sun.
customer_reviews.author: Jaggach

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product! It was delivered by a friendly GoSun ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! It was delivered by a friendly GoSun employee! The product works well, and is exactly what it claims to be. Two thumbs up! -Martin Reed
customer_reviews.author: Martin A Reed

customer_reviews.title: Swell! I wished I had upgraded.
customer_reviews.text: Have the Mini, wish =now I got the bigger one!
customer_reviews.author: KeNTKB

customer_reviews.title: yummy!
customer_reviews.text: Best hotdogs i had in my life! Plus its very good for my asthma :)
customer_reviews.author: Manuel Garrido Pena

customer_reviews.title: easy fun and a super good time
customer_reviews.text: easy fun and a super good time. Love hangin outside and cooking while playing fetch with the dog is great.
customer_reviews.author: Michael healy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We use this thing all the time and it rocks!
customer_reviews.author: Mr Dan K Palmer

customer_reviews.title: This gets the Bronx cheer
customer_reviews.text: It was advertised to be made in America/United States, but, it is/was stamped MADE IN CHINA. That in and of itself is a let down. This was purchased for in case of emergency use ONLY. As I see it there is no other reason I would purchase such as item.
customer_reviews.author: J D P

product_meta.title: GOSUN Survival Gear Solar Oven Sun Cooker
product_meta.description: From America’s Leading Solar Cooking Brand, Designed in Cincinnati Ohio, USA. Featured by Top Chef, Discovery Channel, Outside Magazine, Popular Science and more. The GoSun Sport’s award-winning patented design converts nearly 80% of all sunlight entering it’s reflectors into usable heat, retaining if for hot meals with friends even in the most challenging conditions The Sport package includes: a durable Borosilicate Evacuated Glass Tube cooking chamber, two foldable Parabolic Reflectors made of industry grade anodized aluminum (+95% reflectivity), a Cooking Tray made of 304 Culinary Grade stainless steel, User’s Manual, Cook Booklet, rugged Scrubby Cleaning Tool that attaches onto the tray’s end and a Two Year No-Questions-Asked Warranty when ordered on Amazon from GoSun Stove or Brookstone. GoSun Stove: Powering Lives with Solar Cooking.
feature_bullets: PORTABLE SOLAR STOVE - Deploys in seconds and collapses into a durable package; folding parabolic reflectors protect the cooking tube like a clamshell. Equipped with carrying handles and completely submersible, the Sport is designed for adventure.
COOL TO TOUCH - No fire hazard here. The stove’s solar vacuum tube cooking chamber provides a near perfect layer of insulation, keeping the exterior surface cool even while hot inside.

EASY AND DELICIOUS - Just load food into the tube cooking chamber and set the camber on the reflector to cook, no monitoring required. This solar oven retains your food’s flavor and nutrition cooking from 360° (like a slow cooker - but faster).

FAST AND RELIABLE - Cooks a meal in as little as 20 minutes, reaching temperatures up to 550°F (290°C) in full sunlight. The GoSun Sport is effective at capturing ultraviolet light and holding its heat. If you can see a defined shadow, you can cook!

INCLUDED - Tube cooking chamber, 2 foldable parabolic reflectors, a stainless-steel cooking tray, a rugged scrubby cleaning tool and an instruction manual. GoSun does not require frequent adjustment, making it a low-maintenance, fuel-free cooking device.
